title: Chorizo and bean hotpot
ingredients: ['1 onion', '2 carrots', '2 celery sticks', '1 yellow pepper', '75g chorizo', '1 tbsp oil', '400ml chicken stock', '420g can baked beans', '40g chopped soft sun-dried tomatoes', '1 tsp dried thyme', '1 tsp paprika', '350g packet or can frankfurter sausages', '85g fresh white breadcrumbs', '1 tbsp chopped parsley', '1 tbsp oil']
